that explains why no diseases have ever been cured or prevented! Oh wait they have. Not to mention this would require a conspiracy so vast, encompassing so many business people, doctors and scientist (many of whom do research for universities and others) that the idea is ridiculous on its face.

@joshua13 You took the blue pill didn't you? I quote from Wikipedia "The Big Lie (German: GroĂe LĂźge) is a propaganda technique. The expression was coined by Adolf Hitler, when he dictated his 1925 book Mein Kampf, for a lie so "colossal" that no one would believe that someone "could have the impudence to distort the truth so infamously." Hitler believed the technique was used by Jews to unfairly blame Germany's loss in World War I on German Army officer Erich Ludendorff."
Get rid of this shit. Stop giving people false hope with gimmicks and 'alternative meds'.
